docstring.long_description:
The description of that function is as follows:

    Compute the analytic signal, using the Hilbert transform.

    The transformation is done along the last axis by default.
docstring.short_description: The HILBERT node is based on a numpy or scipy function.

parameters.name: N
parameters.description: Number of Fourier components. Default: x.shape[axis].

parameters.name: axis
parameters.description: Axis along which to do the transformation. Default: -1.
